# FitCheck AI - llms.txt
# For more information: https://llmstxt.org/

> FitCheck AI is a wardrobe management application with AI-powered outfit visualization.

# About
FitCheck AI helps users organize their wardrobe, create outfits, and visualize how they look using AI technology. The app features:
- Digital wardrobe management
- AI-powered item detection from photos
- Outfit creation and organization
- AI outfit visualization and virtual try-on
- Weather-based outfit recommendations
- Outfit sharing with friends
- Calendar integration for outfit planning
- Style analytics and insights

# Contact
- Website: https://fitcheckaiapp.com
- Support: support@fitcheckaiapp.com

# Features

## Wardrobe Management
Upload photos of your clothing items. Our AI automatically detects and catalogs items with details like category, color, brand, and material. Organize items by type, season, occasion, and more.

## Outfit Creation
Combine items from your digital wardrobe to create outfits. Tag them by occasion, season, and style for easy organization. Save your favorite combinations for quick access.

## AI Visualization
Generate realistic visualizations of how outfits would look together using AI image generation. See your outfit combinations before wearing them.

## Smart Recommendations
Get outfit suggestions based on weather, occasion, and your personal style preferences. Never wonder what to wear again.

## Calendar Integration
Plan your outfits ahead of time with calendar integration. Schedule outfits for upcoming events and meetings.

## Sharing
Share your outfits with friends via unique links. Get feedback and inspiration from others.

# Technical Details
- Web application built with React and FastAPI
- AI-powered clothing detection using computer vision
- Virtual try-on using generative AI
- Secure authentication with Supabase
- Cloud storage for wardrobe images

# Privacy
We take privacy seriously. User wardrobe data is private by default. Shared outfits are only visible via explicit sharing links. We do not sell user data.
